data.name: Future of Travel Post COVID Era
data.summary: Learn: How will the #COVID pandemic impact travel & tourism industry? How will the reduction in #GlobalTravel in 2020 lead to impact on jobs?
data.speakers:
Sesh Seshadri, Director, Lonely Planet
Mahendra Vakharia, MD, Pathfinder Holidays
Abhishek Daga, Co-Founder, Thrillophilia
Rickson Goh, Founder & CEO, Tourplus
Nidhi Bansal, CEO, India City Walks
Daksh Sharma, Co-Foudner, Iffort
